happy.text: مَن جَاءَ بِالْحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُ عَشْرُ أَمْثَالِهَا
happy.translation: Whoever brings a good deed will receive ten times as much.

happy.text: فَاسْتَبِقُوا الْخَيْرَاتِ
happy.translation: So race to [all that is] good.

happy.text: وَلَا تَهِنُوا وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا وَأَنتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
happy.translation: So do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are [true] believers.

happy.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا ارْكَعُوا وَاسْجُدُوا وَاعْبُدُوا رَبَّكُمْ
happy.translation: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord.

happy.text: رَبَّنَا عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ أَنَبْنَا
happy.translation: Our Lord, upon You we have relied, and to You we have returned.

happy.text: لِيَزْدَادُوا إِيمَانًا مَّعَ إِيمَانِهِمْ
happy.translation: That they may increase in faith along with their [present] faith.

happy.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
happy.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

happy.text: أَلَا إِنَّ أَوْلِيَاءَ اللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
happy.translation: Unquestionably, the allies of Allah - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.

happy.text: فَحَيُّوا بِأَحْسَنَ مِنْهَا أَوْ رُدُّوهَا
happy.translation: Respond with something better or return it [in kind].

happy.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
happy.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

happy.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
happy.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

happy.text: الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَلَمْ يَلْبِسُوا إِيمَانَهُم بِظُلْمٍ أُولَـٰئِكَ لَهُمُ الْأَمْنُ وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
happy.translation: They who believe and do not mix their belief with injustice - those will have security, and they are [rightly] guided.

happy.text: رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ
happy.translation: Allah being pleased with them and they with Him.

happy.text: فَأُولَـٰئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ اللَّهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ حَسَنَاتٍ
happy.translation: For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good.

happy.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا تُوبُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ تَوْبَةً نَّصُوحًا
happy.translation: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance.

happy.text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدًّا
happy.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.

happy.text: وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَيَسْتَخْلِفَنَّهُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ
happy.translation: Allah has promised those who have believed among you and done righteous deeds that He will surely grant them succession [to authority] upon the earth.

happy.text: وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
happy.translation: And [He will give you] good tidings for the believers.

happy.text: وَتَعَاوَنُوا عَلَى الْبِرِّ وَالتَّقْوَىٰ
happy.translation: And cooperate in righteousness and piety.

happy.text: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
happy.translation: O satisfied soul, return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him].

thankful.text: وَلَقَدْ آتَيْنَا لُقْمَانَ الْحِكْمَةَ أَنِ اشْكُرْ لِلَّهِ
thankful.translation: And We certainly gave Luqman wisdom [and said], 'Be grateful to Allah.'

thankful.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُلُوا مِن طَيِّبَاتِ مَا رَزَقْنَاكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِلَّهِ
thankful.translation: O you who have believed, eat from the good things which We have provided for you and be grateful to Allah.

thankful.text: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ
thankful.translation: So [Solomon] smiled, amused at her speech, and said, 'My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor.'

thankful.text: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَا
thankful.translation: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them.

thankful.text: فَلْيَسْتَجِيبُوا لِي وَلْيُؤْمِنُوا بِي لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْشُدُونَ
thankful.translation: So let them respond to Me [by obedience] and believe in Me that they may be [rightly] guided.

thankful.text: قَالَ يَا مُوسَىٰ إِنِّي اصْطَفَيْتُكَ عَلَى النَّاسِ بِرِسَالَاتِي وَبِكَلَامِي
thankful.translation: He said, 'O Moses, I have chosen you over the people with My messages and My words [to you].'

thankful.text: بَلِ اللَّهَ فَاعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ الشَّاكِرِينَ
thankful.translation: Rather, worship [only] Allah and be among the grateful.

thankful.text: فَلَمَّا أَنجَاهُمْ إِلَى الْبَرِّ إِذَا هُمْ يُشْرِكُونَ
thankful.translation: But when He delivers them to the land, at once they associate others with Him.

thankful.text: وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ السَّمْعَ وَالْأَبْصَارَ وَالْأَفْئِدَةَ
thankful.translation: And He gave you hearing and vision and hearts.

thankful.text: وَذَكِّرْهُم بِأَيَّامِ اللَّهِ
thankful.translation: And remind them of the days of Allah.

thankful.text: وَهُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةً
thankful.translation: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession.

thankful.text: فَلَوْلَا أَنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُسَبِّحِينَ لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
thankful.translation: Had he not been of those who exalt Allah, he would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

thankful.text: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
thankful.translation: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

thankful.text: فَمَن تَصَدَّقَ بِهِ فَهُوَ كَفَّارَةٌ لَّهُ
thankful.translation: But whoever gives [something] up, it is an expiation for him.

thankful.text: بَلِ اللَّهَ فَاعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ الشَّاكِرِينَ
thankful.translation: Rather, worship [only] Allah and be among the grateful.

thankful.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنفِقُوا مِن طَيِّبَاتِ مَا كَسَبْتُمْ
thankful.translation: O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned.

thankful.text: وَاللَّهُ أَخْرَجَكُم مِّن بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ
thankful.translation: And Allah brought you forth from the wombs of your mothers.

thankful.text: اللَّهُ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ
thankful.translation: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth.

thankful.text: وَهُوَ الَّذِي أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ السَّمْعَ وَالْأَبْصَارَ وَالْأَفْئِدَةَ
thankful.translation: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts.

thankful.text: مَّثَلُ الَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ حَبَّةٍ أَنبَتَتْ سَبْعَ سَنَابِلَ
thankful.translation: The example of those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah is like a seed [of grain] that sprouts seven ears.

angry.text: وَالَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَائِرَ الْإِثْمِ وَالْفَوَاحِشَ وَإِذَا مَا غَضِبُوا هُمْ يَغْفِرُونَ
angry.translation: And those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, and when they are angry, they forgive.

angry.text: وَإِنْ عَاقَبْتُمْ فَعَاقِبُوا بِمِثْلِ مَا عُوقِبْتُمْ بِهِ
angry.translation: And if you punish [an enemy], punish with an equivalent of that with which you were harmed.

angry.text: وَلَا يَجْرِمَنَّكُمْ شَنَآنُ قَوْمٍ عَلَىٰ أَلَّا تَعْدِلُوا
angry.translation: And do not let the hatred of a people prevent you from being just.
And do good; indeed, Allah loves the doers of good.
Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good instruction.
Repel evil by that [deed] which is better.
So pardon them and ask forgiveness for them.
So overlook [their faults] with gracious forgiveness.
Repel [evil] by that [deed] which is better.
But if you are patient, it is better for those who are patient.
Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.
Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
And be patient. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
Take what is given freely, enjoin what is good.
But if you pardon and overlook and forgive.

angry.text: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنْ عَزْمِ الْأُمُورِ
angry.translation: And whoever is patient and forgives - indeed, that is of the matters [requiring] determination.
So fear Allah and amend that which is between you.
So decree whatever you are to decree.
And reconciliation is better.
But if you are patient, it is better for those who are patient.

anxious.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
anxious.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

anxious.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
anxious.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

anxious.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
anxious.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

anxious.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
anxious.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

anxious.text: وَأَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ وَلَا تَنَازَعُوا فَتَفْشَلُوا وَتَذْهَبَ رِيحُكُمْ
anxious.translation: And obey Allah and His Messenger and do not dispute and [thus] lose courage.

anxious.text: يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُقْرِضُونَ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا
anxious.translation: They establish prayer and give zakah, and they fear Allah and the Last Day.

anxious.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ
anxious.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.'

anxious.text: الَّذِينَ قَالُوا رَبُّنَا اللَّهُ ثُمَّ اسْتَقَامُوا
anxious.translation: Those who say, 'Our Lord is Allah' and then remain steadfast.

anxious.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
anxious.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

anxious.text: ظَهَرَ الْفَسَادُ فِي الْبَرِّ وَالْبَحْرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ أَيْدِي النَّاسِ
anxious.translation: Corruption has appeared throughout the land and sea by what the people have earned.

anxious.text: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ
anxious.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.

anxious.text: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا أَنْزِلْ عَلَيْنَا مَآئِدَةً مِنَ السَّمَاءِ
anxious.translation: O Allah, our Lord, send us a table spread [with food] from the sky.

anxious.text: وَلَوْ أَنَّ أَهْلَ قُرَىٰ آمَنُوا وَاتَّقَوْا لَفَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ بَرَكَاتٍ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ
anxious.translation: And if the people of those towns had believed and been conscious of Allah, We would certainly have opened up to them blessings from the heavens and the earth.

anxious.text: فَإِذَا عَزَمْتَ فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ
anxious.translation: So when you have decided, then rely upon Allah.

anxious.text: وَإِذَا قَرَأْتَ الْقُرْآنَ فَاسْتَعِذْ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
anxious.translation: And when you recite the Quran, seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil.

anxious.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
anxious.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

anxious.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
anxious.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

anxious.text: يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُقْرِضُونَ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا
anxious.translation: They establish prayer and give zakah, and they fear Allah and the Last Day.

anxious.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
anxious.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

anxious.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
anxious.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

anxious.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
anxious.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

lonely.text: يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا
lonely.translation: He knows whatever goes into the earth and whatever comes out of it.

lonely.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
lonely.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

lonely.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
lonely.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

lonely.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ
lonely.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.'

lonely.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
lonely.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

lonely.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
lonely.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

lonely.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
lonely.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

lonely.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
lonely.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

lonely.text: يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا
lonely.translation: He knows whatever goes into the earth and whatever comes out of it.

lonely.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
lonely.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

lonely.text: يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
lonely.translation: O My servants who have believed, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

lonely.text: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا أَنْزِلْ عَلَيْنَا مَآئِدَةً مِنَ السَّمَاءِ
lonely.translation: O Allah, our Lord, send us a table spread [with food] from the sky.

lonely.text: وَلَوْ أَنَّ أَهْلَ قُرَىٰ آمَنُوا وَاتَّقَوْا لَفَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ بَرَكَاتٍ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ
lonely.translation: And if the people of those towns had believed and been conscious of Allah, We would certainly have opened up to them blessings from the heavens and the earth.

lonely.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
lonely.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

lonely.text: يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا
lonely.translation: He knows whatever goes into the earth and whatever comes out of it.

lonely.text: يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُقْرِضُونَ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا
lonely.translation: They establish prayer and give zakah, and they fear Allah and the Last Day.

lonely.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
lonely.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

lonely.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
lonely.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

lonely.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
lonely.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

lonely.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ
lonely.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.'

sad.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

sad.text: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ
sad.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.
And do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption and causing crops and animals to perish.

sad.text: وَأَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ وَلَا تَنَازَعُوا فَتَفْشَلُوا وَتَذْهَبَ رِيحُكُمْ
sad.translation: And obey Allah and His Messenger and do not dispute and [thus] lose courage.

sad.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
sad.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

sad.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
sad.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

sad.text: يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
sad.translation: O My servants who have believed, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

sad.text: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ
sad.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.

sad.text: يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُقْرِضُونَ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا
sad.translation: They establish prayer and give zakah, and they fear Allah and the Last Day.

sad.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
sad.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

sad.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
sad.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

sad.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ
sad.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.'

sad.text: لَا يَنْهَاكُمُ اللَّهُ عَنِ الَّذِينَ لَمْ يُقَاتِلُوكُمْ فِي الدِّينِ وَلَمْ يُخْرِجُوكُمْ مِنْ دِيَارِكُمْ أَنْ تَبَرُّوهُمْ وَتُقْسِطُوا إِلَيْهِمْ
sad.translation: Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes - from being righteous and acting justly toward them.

sad.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
sad.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

sad.text: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ
sad.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.

sad.text: وَلَوْ أَنَّ أَهْلَ قُرَىٰ آمَنُوا وَاتَّقَوْا لَفَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ بَرَكَاتٍ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ
sad.translation: And if the people of those towns had believed and been conscious of Allah, We would certainly have opened up to them blessings from the heavens and the earth.

sad.text: يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
sad.translation: O My servants who have believed, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

afraid.translation: It is only the devil who causes you to fear his allies.

afraid.text: وَأَعِدُّوا لَهُمْ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُمْ مِن قُوَّةٍ
afraid.translation: And prepare against them whatever you are able of power.

afraid.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
afraid.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
And say, 'Truth has come, and falsehood has vanished.'
For you is your religion, and for me is my religion.
And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

afraid.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
afraid.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

afraid.text: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ
afraid.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.

afraid.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ
afraid.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.'

afraid.text: لَا يَنْهَاكُمُ اللَّهُ عَنِ الَّذِينَ لَمْ يُقَاتِلُوكُمْ فِي الدِّينِ وَلَمْ يُخْرِجُوكُمْ مِنْ دِيَارِكُمْ أَنْ تَبَرُّوهُمْ وَتُقْسِطُوا إِلَيْهِمْ
afraid.translation: Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes - from being righteous and acting justly toward them.

afraid.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
afraid.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

afraid.text: وَعِبَادُ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا
afraid.translation: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily.

afraid.text: وَأَعِدُّوا لَهُمْ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُمْ مِن قُوَّةٍ
afraid.translation: And prepare against them whatever you are able of power.

afraid.text: يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا
afraid.translation: He knows whatever goes into the earth and whatever comes out of it.

afraid.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
afraid.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

afraid.text: يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُقْرِضُونَ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا
afraid.translation: They establish prayer and give zakah, and they fear Allah and the Last Day.

afraid.text: يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
afraid.translation: O My servants who have believed, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
And say, 'Truth has come, and falsehood has vanished.'

depressed.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
depressed.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

depressed.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
depressed.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

depressed.text: يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
depressed.translation: O My servants who have believed, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

depressed.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
depressed.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

depressed.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
depressed.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

depressed.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
depressed.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

depressed.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
depressed.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

depressed.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
depressed.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

depressed.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
depressed.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

depressed.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ
depressed.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.'

depressed.text: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ
depressed.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.

depressed.text: لَا يَنْهَاكُمُ اللَّهُ عَنِ الَّذِينَ لَمْ يُقَاتِلُوكُمْ فِي الدِّينِ وَلَمْ يُخْرِجُوكُمْ مِنْ دِيَارِكُمْ أَنْ تَبَرُّوهُمْ وَتُقْسِطُوا إِلَيْهِمْ
depressed.translation: Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes - from being righteous and acting justly toward them.

depressed.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
depressed.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

depressed.text: وَقُلْ جَاءَ الْحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ الْبَاطِلُ
depressed.translation: And say, 'Truth has come, and falsehood has vanished.'

depressed.text: يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُقْرِضُونَ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا
depressed.translation: They establish prayer and give zakah, and they fear Allah and the Last Day.

depressed.text: يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
depressed.translation: O My servants who have believed, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

depressed.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
depressed.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

depressed.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
depressed.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

depressed.text: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ
depressed.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.

depressed.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
depressed.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

weak.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.'
For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

weak.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
weak.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

weak.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
weak.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

weak.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ
weak.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.'
For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

upset.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
upset.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

upset.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
upset.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

upset.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
upset.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

upset.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
upset.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

upset.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
upset.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

upset.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ
upset.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.'

upset.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
upset.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

upset.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
upset.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

upset.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
upset.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

upset.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
upset.translation: And We send down in the Quran such things that have healing and mercy for the believers.

upset.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
upset.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'

upset.text: يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
upset.translation: O My servants who have believed, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

upset.text: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ
upset.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.

upset.text: وَأَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ وَلَا تَنَازَعُوا فَتَفْشَلُوا وَتَذْهَبَ رِيحُكُمْ
upset.translation: And obey Allah and His Messenger and do not dispute and [thus] lose courage.

upset.text: وَلَا تَبْسُطْهَا كُلَّ الْبَسْطِ
upset.translation: And do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption and causing crops and animals to perish.

upset.text: وَعِبَادُ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا
upset.translation: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily.

upset.text: إِنَّمَا ذَٰلِكُمُ الشَّيْطَانُ يُخَوِّفُ أَوْلِيَاءَهُ
upset.translation: It is only the devil who causes you to fear his allies.

upset.text: فَذُكُرُونِي أَذْكُرْكُمْ
upset.translation: So remember Me; I will remember you.

upset.text: يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُقْرِضُونَ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا
upset.translation: They establish prayer and give zakah, and they fear Allah and the Last Day.

upset.text: وَإِذْ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكُمْ لَئِنْ شَكَرْتُمْ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمْ
upset.translation: And [remember] when your Lord proclaimed: 'If you give thanks [by accepting faith and worship], I will give you more [of My Blessings].'

upset.text: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَالِحًا مِن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهُ حَيَاةً طَيِّبَةً
upset.translation: Whoever does righteous deeds, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life.

danger.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
danger.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

danger.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
danger.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

danger.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
danger.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us; He is our protector.'

danger.text: وَإِذْ يَمْكُرُ بِكَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيُثْبِتُوكَ أَوْ يَقْتُلُوكَ أَوْ يُخْرِجُوكَ
danger.translation: And [remember] when those who disbelieved plotted against you to imprison you or kill you or evict you. They were plotting and Allah was plotting, and Allah is the best of plotters.

danger.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
danger.translation: And We send down in the Quran that which is healing and mercy for the believers.

danger.text: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ
danger.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.

danger.text: وَإِذَا رَكِبُوا فِي الْفُلْكِ دَعَوُا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ
danger.translation: And when they embark on a ship, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion.

danger.text: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَعْبُدُ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ حَرْفٍ
danger.translation: And of the people is he who worships Allah on an edge.

danger.text: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ اللَّيْلَ سُبَاتًا وَالنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
danger.translation: It is He who made the night for you to rest and the day to seek livelihood.

danger.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا جَاءَكُمُ الْمُؤْمِنَاتُ مُهَاجِرَاتٍ
danger.translation: O you who have believed, when there come to you believing women emigrants.

danger.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
danger.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

danger.text: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَؤُا بِكُمْ رَبِّي لَوْلَا دُعَاؤُكُمْ
danger.translation: Say, 'My Lord would not care for you if it were not for your supplication.'

danger.text: وَرَبُّكَ يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَاءُ وَيِخْتَارُ
danger.translation: And your Lord creates what He wills and chooses.

danger.text: وَقَالُوا مَا هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا الدُّنْيَا
danger.translation: And they said, 'There is nothing but our worldly life; we die and live, and nothing destroys us except time.'

danger.text: يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا قُلْتُ لِيُغْفِرُ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ
danger.translation: O My servants who have believed, My earth is spacious, so worship only Me.

danger.text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَىٰ غَيْبٍ بِضَنِينٍ
danger.translation: And it is not at all difficult for Him to know what is hidden.

danger.text: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَبْذُلُ نَفْسَهُ ابْتِغَاءَ مَرْضَاتِ اللَّهِ
danger.translation: And among the people is he who gives his life to seek the pleasure of Allah.

danger.text: يَرْفَعِ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ دَرَجَاتٍ
danger.translation: Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees.

danger.text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
danger.translation: We have certainly created man into hardship.

danger.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
danger.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

danger.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
danger.translation: As for one whose scales are heavy.

danger.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا ارْكَعُوا وَسْجُدُوا وَاعْبُدُوا رَبَّكُمْ
danger.translation: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord.

danger.text: قَدْ كَانَتْ لَكُمْ فِيْهِمْ أُسْوَةٌ حَسَنَةٌ
danger.translation: There has certainly been for you in them an excellent pattern.
